summary: the development of broad antiviral spectrum hand disinfectants is limited due to a small number of permissible active ingredients. different amounts of citric acid and urea were added to create a virucidal claim against poliovirus (PV), adenovirus type 5 (AdV) and polyomavirus SV40 (SV40) as non-enveloped test viruses in the presence of fetal calf serum (FCS) as soil load.
